Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by St. Louis in 1986...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1988, off Dennis Lewallyn (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/1988, off Mark Fidrych (SF)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1989, hitting .522 with 6 HR, 7 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 10/2/1989...
Hit 3 homeruns against Cincinnati, driving in 5 runs on 5/5/1991...
Injured on 9/11/1991 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 7/12/1992...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Won World Series with St. Louis in 1993...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1994, hitting .450 with 5 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Chicago (N), driving in 9 runs on 6/2/1995...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1995, hitting .542 with 4 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1995, hitting .361 with 9 HR, 20 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Pittsburgh on 8/8/1995...
Was selected to the 1996 Allstar game...
